name: OS 25-inch — Lancashire CIV (1893–1905)
description: Ordnance Survey 25-inch maps (1:2,500) covering Manchester in extreme detail. Shows individual buildings, property boundaries, and land use.
notes:
NLS has georeferenced seamless layer for 1890s-1920s via MapTiler API (requires key).
IIIF available for individual sheets via NLS IIIF Image API 2.0.
Pattern: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/{folder}%2F{mapId}/info.json

Central Manchester sheets (16 sheets in CIV 4x4 grid, 1:2500 scale):
  CIV.2 (Manchester, Salford, 1893): https://maps.nls.uk/view/126522773
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/12652%2F126522773/info.json
    Bounds: -2.272227,53.495652 to -2.235722,53.510224
  CIV.6 (Manchester, Salford): https://maps.nls.uk/view/126522809
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/12652%2F126522809/info.json
    Bounds: -2.272347,53.481193 to -2.235853,53.495764
  CIV.7 (Manchester, 1893): https://maps.nls.uk/view/126522815
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/12652%2F126522815/info.json
    Bounds: -2.235985,53.481070 to -2.199481,53.495652
  CIV.11 (Manchester): https://maps.nls.uk/view/126522842
    IIIF: https://map-view.nls.uk/iiif/2/12652%2F126522842/info.json
    Bounds: -2.236117,53.466610 to -2.199625,53.481193

All 16 CIV sheets: 1-8,10-13,16 at https://maps.nls.uk/os/25inch-england-and-wales/lancashire.html
